name: Stellar Lyre
description: A lyre crafted from a fallen star's crystalline essence, its strings humming with celestial harmonics. When played, it is said to summon melodies that can weave the fabric of reality itself.

name: Glimmering Starlight Dust
description: Tiny fragments of starlight distilled into a sparkling dust. This precious substance is rumored to hold within it the essence of creation's earliest moments and could grant immense insight to those who possess it.
